pages.text: The Gardens of the Dead mod adds new biomes and decorative blocks to the nether.
The Whistling Woods is an eerie biome. The reeds of whistlecane shriek with the cries of the dead.$(br)
The Soulblight Forest is renowned for its Soulblight mushrooms. They produce spores that emanate the faint glow of soul light.$(br)$(br)
